title: Grip-Tite Tite Grip 1 - Non Slip Grip Sport Lotion
description: Keep your hands from perspiring while playing golf or other sports with the ProActive Tite-Grip antiperspirant hand lotion. The non-sticky topical hand cream goes on clear and will not stain, keeping your hand comfortable even when worn under a sports glove. Each application of the Tite-Grip lotion lasts between four and six hours.
